nodes.text: Top Trumps Quiz - Star Wars is a trivia quiz game dealing with the Star Wars franchise.

Are you a Star Wars expert? Can you identify the difference between Episodes 3-6 & Episodes 1-3 and can you remember specific scenes from Episode 7: The Force Awakens? Travel to a galaxy far, far away and test your Star Wars knowledge to see if you are a force to be reckoned with. With 500 questions to answer, it's great for the whole family, whether you want a quick game on the go or to spend some time seeing how much you really know! With a Top Trumps twist at the end to test your memory, can you remember what you learned just moments ago?
